name: Trace Media
query:
select 
m.name as "Media:Link/Media NS:100",
m.media_type as "Media Type:Link/Media Type NS:100", 
mm.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:150", 
mm.project as "Project:Link/Project:200",
mm.name as "Movement Ref:Link/Media Movement:120",
mm.transaction_date as "Transaction Date:Date:120",
mm.movement_type as "Transaction Type:Data:120",
mm.transit_method as "Transit Method:Data:120",
mm.delivered_by as "Delivered By:Link/Contact:120",
mm.received_by as  "Received By:Link/Contact:120",
mm.remarks  as "Remarks:Data:120",
m.external_id as "ExternalID:Data:100", 
m.media_owner as "Media Owner:Link/Contact:120", 
m.film_title as "Film Title:Data:120",
m.film_era as "Film Era:Link/Film Era:80",
CASE m.film_reel_no 
    WHEN 0 THEN NULL
    ELSE m.film_reel_no  
END
as "Film ReelNo:Data:100",
m.film_type as "Film Type:Link/Film Type:100",
m.film_sound as "Film Sound:Link/Film Sound:100",
m.film_element as "Film Element:Link/Film Element:100",
CASE m.film_approximate_length_feet 
    WHEN 0 THEN NULL
    ELSE m.film_approximate_length_feet  
END
as "Film Length (approx ft):Int:100",
m.is_checkerboard as "Is Checkerboard:Check:100",
m.film_content_description as "Film Content Description:Data:120",
m.tape_title as "Tape Title:Data:120",
m.tape_type as "Tape Type:Link/Tape Type:100",
m.tape_standard as "Tape Standard:Link/Tape Standard:100",
m.tape_era as "Tape Era:Link/Tape Era:80",
m.tape_manufacturer as "Tape Manufacturer:Link/Manufacturer:100",
m.tape_run_time_mins as "Tape Run time Mins:Int:100",
m.tape_content_description as "Tape Content Description:Data:100",
m.data_device_type as "Data Device Type:Link/Data Device Type:100",
m.data_device_capacity as "Data Device Capacity:Link/Data Device Capacity:100",
m.data_device_format as "Data Device Format:Link/Data Device Format:100",
m.data_device_brand as "Data Device Brand:Link/Brand:100",
m.has_datacable as "Has DataCable:Check:80",
m.has_psu as "Has PSU:Check:80",
has_box  as "Has Box:Check:80",
m.notes as "Notes:Data:100"
from 
`tabMedia NS` as m
inner join `tabMedia Movement Item` as mmi on m.name = mmi.media_id
inner join `tabMedia Movement` as mm on mm.name = mmi.parent
and mm.docstatus = 1
order by mm.transaction_date desc,mm.name desc,m.media_type,m.name,m.customer
